text: Motion
"Tatenishiki"

Three threads form one warp thread,
creating various patterns――

It's such...
a mysterious weaving technique.
Everyone, good job.
Good job!
Oh, that's a beautiful fabric.

It's something I made in a hands-on
workshop a while ago.
Hehe, it's beautiful, right~!
Ah, it would look good as an obi, like Amana's.
Hehe, yay!
Since we have it, shall we tie it properly?

Oh, no! Is it okay?
It's been cleaned nicely, but it might wrinkle!

That's right! Tenka, why don't you
take a look at it too? Here you go!

Yeah...!
Wow...! It's amazing... so beautiful...!

Haha, it looks like
it would suit Tenka too.
Hehe...

But, doing this
makes me want to wear a yukata too.

If that's the case, we might have a chance soon. I've got a job
with a town magazine, and they're going to cover the fair.

Wow!
Let's all wear yukatas together~!

Hehe...
Yeah.
